allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Careers, Appointments pages and update Our Story with team bios

Features:
- Add multi-step Careers application form with validation
  - Support for Medical Assistants and Providers \(NP, PA, MD, DO\)
  - Employment type options: Full-Time, Part-Time, Open to Either
  - Day availability checkboxes for part-time positions
  - Resume/cover letter upload with base64 encoding
- Add Appointment Request form with new/existing patient flow
  - HIPAA notice and security messaging
  - Conditional fields for new patients
- Update Our Story page with Dr. Jackson''s full bio
- Add Apple Evangelista NP bio to Care Team section
- Add Netlify serverless functions for form submissions
- Add site configuration and accessibility controls

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
